Class EnquiryService

java.lang.Object
services.subservices.EnquiryService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEnquiryService
public class EnquiryService extends Object implements IEnquiryService
Service class that handles all enquiry-related operations such as adding, viewing, editing, replying to, and deleting enquiries. It interacts with the EnquiryDB for data persistence.

      Displays a list of enquiries and allows the user to select one for viewing.
      Specified by:
      chooseFromEnquiryList in interface IEnquiryService
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner to capture user input
      enquiryList - The list of enquiries available for selection
      Returns:
      The selected Enquiry, or null if the user cancels

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • replyEnquiry

      public void replyEnquiry(Scanner sc, Enquiry selectedEnquiry, String replierID)
      Allows a manager or officer to reply to a selected enquiry. Adds the reply content, reply timestamp, and replier ID.
      Specified by:
      replyEnquiry in interface IEnquiryService
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner for reply content
      selectedEnquiry - The enquiry to reply to
      replierID - The NRIC of the officer or manager replying
